Displayed_content: Welcome to 'The incluesion Protocol,' where we believe training should be fun.  So lets horse around and learn simultaneously.
Type 'walk forward' to put the horse through its paces. The laugh meter will light up when you type the directions accurately, otherwise try again.
SpeakerA: Look at you following directions,  I'll have to watch out for you.
SpeakerB: Look at you following directions,  I'll have to watch out for you.
SpeakerC: Look at you following directions,  I'll have to watch out for you.

Displayed_content: Try 'turn left'. Because let's be honest, not everything is a straight line.
SpeakerA: Where are you going?" Our supervisor is looking for you.
SpeakerB: Where are you going?" Our supervisor is looking for you.
SpeakerC: Where are you going?" Our supervisor is looking for you.

Displayed_content: Type 'observe report', to explore the report you will present in 5 minutes.
SpeakerA: Yay, I used to have to jump when called upon. Its good not to be the new employee.
SpeakerB: Yay, I used to have to jump when called upon. Its good not to be the new employee.
SpeakerC: Yay, I used to have to jump when called upon. Its good not to be the new employee.

Displayed_content: Looking for a solution? Type 'eat report' because, frankly, that report is only good if it comes straight from the horse's mouth.
SpeakerA: Mmmm fiber, not as good as the apple you want. Get used to it.
SpeakerB: Mmmm fiber, not as good as the apple you want. Get used to it.
SpeakerC: Mmmm fiber, not as good as the apple you want. Get used to it.

Displayed_content: It's time for a real challenge. Type 'turn right' to look back down the hallway.
SpeakerA: Back on Track? Ready to join the herd or take the lead?
SpeakerB: Back on Track? Ready to join the herd or take the lead?
SpeakerC: Back on Track? Ready to join the herd or take the lead?

Displayed_content: Congratulations! Youâ€™ve successfully navigated 'The incluesion Protocol' tutorial. Remember, in this game, like in the office, sometimes you have to trot before you can gallop.
Let's do something bold. Type 'trot to the shiny object'.
SpeakerA: Looks like this is going to be a horse race. Saddle up!
SpeakerB: Looks like this is going to be a horse race. Saddle up!
SpeakerC: Looks like this is going to be a horse race. Saddle up!
